goods_id,

mapper.update:
update goods
goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_type = #{goodsType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_price = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=REAL},

goods_size = #{goodsSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_pictures = #{goodsPictures,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update goods set goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_type = #{goodsType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_price = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, goods_desc = #{goodsDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_color = #{goodsColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_size = #{goodsSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_pictures = #{goodsPictures,jdbcType=INTEGER} where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
